definition: the cry of an ass, to laugh loudly and harshly
details:
noun
- the cry of an ass
verb
- to laugh loudly and harshly
= example: to laugh loudly and harshly
- to reduce to small pieces or particles by pounding or abrading
= example: to reduce to small pieces or particles by pounding or abrading
= synonyms: crunch
- to braying characteristic of donkeys
= example: to braying characteristic of donkeys
= synonyms: hee-haw
